activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5463
activity.text: I was looking at the files and found that at most places we only need values of temperature, not graphs or any thing like that( ig there is only one place where we are plotting graph b/w temp and dates). So I was thinking maybe we can display both values at places where the temperature is mentioned such as: 25 °C/ 77 °F. Only if you find this approach good enough.
